Parameter.name: AUTO_ADJ_CLK_FREQ
Parameter.desc: Clock and Frequency Offset Auto-Adjustment (see struct adm_config_s). MSB : control, b[0] : Coarse clock auto-adjust on PONG. 1: enable, 0: disable b[1] : Reserved b[2] : Frequency Offset auto-adjust on PONG. 1: enable, 0: disable b[3] : Reserved b[4] : Coarse clock auto-adjust on PONG appliance 1: One Shot, 0: Every time b[5] : Adjust error due to the Gateway on clock auto-adjust 1: Enable, 0: Disable b[6] : Frequency Offset auto-adjust on PONG appliance. 1: One Shot, 0: Every time b[7] : Reserved LSB : RSSI min. level.

Parameter.name: ADM_ANN_DIS_FLT
Parameter.desc: ADM ANN Reception Filter disable (see struct adm_config_s) b[0] : Day Prog. filter. 0: enable, 1: disable b[1] : Delta Second filter. 0: enable, 1: disable b[2] : HW ver.filter. 0: enable, 1: disable b[3] : SW Ver. Initial filter. 0: enable, 1: disable b[4] : SW Ver. Target filter. 0: enable, 1: disable b[5] : Max. Block Number filter. 0: enable, 1: disable b[6:7] : Reserved

Parameter.name: ADM_PARAM_DIS_FLT
Parameter.desc: ADM R/W parameters Reception Filter disable (see struct adm_config_s) b[0] : Read parameter WO filter. 0: enable, 1: disable b[1] : Write parameter RO filter. 0: enable, 1: disable b[2:7] : Reserved

Parameter.name: ADM_KEY_DIS_FLT
Parameter.desc: ADM Key Change Reception Filter disable (see struct adm_config_s) b[0] : Write Key id filter. 0: enable, 1: disable b[1] : Key chg filter. 0: enable, 1: disable b[2:7] : Reserved

Parameter.name: DWN_DAY_PRG_WIN_MIN
Parameter.desc: Minimum delay in second between the AnnDownload and the day of the first block (see struct adm_config_s)

Parameter.name: DWN_DAY_PRG_WIN_MAX
Parameter.desc: Maximum delay in second between the AnnDownload and the day of the first block (see struct adm_config_s)

Parameter.name: MNT_WINDOW_DURATION
Parameter.desc: Maintenance Window duration in second from 00:00:00 UTC (see struct adm_config_s). Set to 0, means no maintenance Window.

Parameter.name: DWN_DELTA_SEC_MIN
Parameter.desc: Minimum deltaSec accepted in second (see struct adm_config_s)

Parameter.name: DWN_BLK_DURATION_MOD
Parameter.desc: Duration of one block in ms (see struct adm_config_s)

Parameter.name: DWN_BLK_NB_MAX
Parameter.desc: Maximum number of block accepted (see struct adm_config_s)

Parameter.name: ADM_RECEPTION_OFFSET
Parameter.desc: Offset to start RX before (in ms) (MSB first, Signed number limited to +/-63ms).

Parameter.name: DWN_RECEPTION_OFFSET
Parameter.desc: Offset to start RX before (in ms) (MSB first, Signed number limited to +/-1000ms).

Parameter.name: L2_EXCH_DIS_FLT
Parameter.desc: L2 Reception Filter disable (see struct proto_config_s) b[0] : Crc filter. 0: enable, 1: disable b[1] : Afield filter. 0: enable, 1: disable b[2] : MField filter. 0: enable, 1: disable b[3] : CiFiled filter. 0: enable, 1: disable b[4] : DownId filter. 0: enable, 1: disable b[5:7] : Reserved

Parameter.name: L6_EXCH_DIS_FLT
Parameter.desc: L6 Reception Filter disable (see struct proto_config_s) b[0] : Reserved b[1] : HashKmac filter. 0: enable, 1: disable b[2] : HashKenc filter. 0: enable, 1: disable b[3] : L6NetId filter. 0: enable, 1: disable b[4:7] : Reserved
